mapper.update: update R_User_Module_CallTrans set VerSn = #{versn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UsrSn = #{usrsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, StartTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EndTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Duration = #{duration,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BilledCallCnt = #{billedcallcnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CallPayAmount = #{callpayamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ModCallCnt = #{modcallcnt,jdbcType=INTEGER} where UmcSn = #{umcsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select UmcSn, VerSn, UsrSn, StartTime, EndTime, Duration, BilledCallCnt, CallPayAmount, ModCallCnt from R_User_Module_CallTrans where UmcSn = #{umcsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
